text: Christina Jutterström (born 27 March 1940) is a Swedish journalist. She is the former chief editor for Dagens Nyheter between 1982 and 1995 and for Expressen between 1995 and 1996. In 2001, Jutterström became the CEO post at public broadcaster Sveriges Television. She held the position until Eva Hamilton took over on 5 November 5, 2006.Eva Hamilton takes top job in Swedish Television, The Local, 13 October 2006 Jutterström was married to Ingemar Odlander from 1978 until his death in 2014. == References == Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish journalists
title: Christina Jutterström
